revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=CTR350 |revision= |upc=094922814722 |asin=B001FWH0A0 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WAP-210U |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/06/2007 |fcc_id=UXX-CTR350 |ic_id=6921A-CTR350 |type=mobile hotspot, travel router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP3023 |cpu1_cspeed=250 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320B-70TP |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V64S40ETP |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=U-MEDIA WMD-201A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=CTR-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^CTR-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth=00:30:44 }} {{TagLine|Cellular Travel Router}}
"WAP-210U" and "Rev:UB" appears to be silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"WMD-201A Rev.UA" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The FCC photos show the device with a ''Mira'' P2V64S4... RAM chip :(likely P2V64S40DTP or P2V64S40ETP, 8MB).
The default password is the last 6 characters of the MAC address.
